original_title: AV女学院1 天使のパンツは校則違反
overview: The legendary AV queen who made all the men go crazy with such a cute girl doing such a hard performance! Tonight, Rui Sakuragi, Hitomi Shiraishi, and Mirei Asaoka, who are No. 1 transcendent beautiful girls in terms of character, power, looks, etc., will be revived with you!! !Apologizing to his ancestors, the president decided to commit suicide = The president of the academy proposes to go to an AV actress training academy to save Matsumoto Gakuin. Three cute girls with completely different living environments jumped in there! Practicing SM, masturbation, fellatio, etc., and instructors who mercilessly squeezed them. At first, he resists and runs out of the academy, but before he knows it...!
title: AV Girl's School Part 1
